noPostsDescription.core: Your core friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!
noPostsDescription.inner: Your inner circle friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!
noPostsDescription.outer: Your outer circle friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!

getStarted.core: Get started by adding up to 5 friends to your Core.

getStarted.outer: Get started by adding up to 150 friends to your Outer Circle.

addToSee.outer: Add up to 150 friends to see their posts here.

dashboard.subtitle: Curate and tend to your closest relationships
dashboard.localStorageHint: ğŸ’¡ Your lists are saved locally. Create an account to sync across devices and enable mutual matching.
dashboard.dunbarDisclaimer: Note: These Dunbar-inspired tier limits are subject to change as community conscience science evolves. Future modifications may include rules where certain tier counts affect others â€” for example, parasocial connections might reduce your allowable outer friend capacity.

toasts.dataLiberation: Your data belongs to you. Export anytime to take it elsewhere.

mission.title: Face Time, Not Ad Time
mission.description: We win when you leave our site â€” to share real moments with the people who matter most.
mission.inspiration: Our inspiration? This classic Dentyne Ice commercial â€” the perfect reminder that the best moments happen when you put down the phone and show up:
mission.quote: "Make Face Time" â€” that's the ideal. When distance separates you, we'll help you bridge it with video kalls. But always remember: nothing beats being there.

spark.description: When you're apart, one click connects you
